title.rendered: From Start to Finish: Building a Scalable Lead Conversion Strategy for 2019

content.rendered:
Join SendinBlue and Sleeknote in this webinar as you learn how to sustainably acquire more leads with a customer-centric lead generation strategy and successfully convert those leads into customers using email marketing.

In This Webinar You Will Learn

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • The importance of taking a customer-first approach to lead generation and nurturing in 2018
  • How to generate leads for your e-commerce store without hurting the user experience
  • How to turn e-commerce leads into customers through relationship building
  • What effective lead generation for SaaS companies looks like
  • How to boost SaaS conversion rates with informational nurturing campaigns
